interpretation: The "running shirt" card is all about pushing yourself to the limit and breaking through personal barriers. Just like a runner who strives to improve their time with each race, this card encourages you to strive for personal growth and self-improvement. It represents a time of intense focus and determination, where you are fully committed to achieving your goals. You may need to step out of your comfort zone and challenge yourself to new heights. But remember to pace yourself and take breaks when needed, as burnout is a real danger. This card can also signify a need for physical activity and exercise to release pent-up energy and stress. Overall, the "running shirt" card reminds you to keep pushing forward and never give up on your dreams.
